title: Maryland Joins Other States Proposing Commercial Finance Disclosure Laws: Truth-in-Lending Type Disclosures in Commercial Loans - JD Supra
content: Maryland Joins Other States Proposing Commercial Finance Disclosure Laws: Truth-in-Lending Type Disclosures in Commercial Loans  JD Supra
description: Earlier this month, Maryland State Senator Benjamin K. Kramer introduced Senate Bill 825 titled “Consumer Credit - Commercial Financing Transactions.”...
